00062          bool operator == (const VectorElement& elm) const {
00063             return ( m_mapAndItemID == 
00064                      (static_cast<const ReverseLookupItemElement*> (&elm))
00065                         ->m_mapAndItemID);
00066          };

00070             return ( m_mapAndItemID != 
00071                      (static_cast<const ReverseLookupItemElement*> (&elm) )
00072                         ->m_mapAndItemID);
00073          };

00079                         ->m_mapAndItemID);
00080          };

00145 inline uint32
00146 ReverseLookupItemElement::getOverviewItemID() 
00147 {
00148    return (m_overviewItemID);
00149 }
00150 
00151 inline uint32 
00152 ReverseLookupItemElement::getTrueMapID()
00153 {
00154    return (uint32(m_mapAndItemID >> 32));
00155 }
00156 
00157 inline uint32
00158 ReverseLookupItemElement::getTrueItemID()
00159 {
00160    return (uint32(m_mapAndItemID & 0x00000000ffffffff));
00161 }
